EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-04-22 Verizon VMT Multi-Cloud II 1.Survey Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Win A $100 Amazon Gift Card | Verizon & VMTurbo State of Multi-Cloud Part II
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Take Survey: The State of Enterprise Multi-Cloud II Win 1 of 10 $100 Amazon Gift Cards! <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/VMT-Vz-state-of-multi-cloud-2]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
This survey is the second in a series of four, conducted by Verizon & VMTurbo, which will collectively establish a baseline for where organizations currently reside along the Multi-Cloud journey, and establish a framework for proceeding on the path to Hybrid Cloud over the next 3 years. A 45-page report of the results from the first installation is available here <[[http://vmturbo.com/resources/the-state-of-multi-cloud-part-one?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=the-state-of-multi-cloud-part-one&utm_content=04222016]]>.
Your participation in this survey is integral to the completion of a seminal document that will serve to benefit a multitude of enterprises as they devise and execute their strategy. This survey will take approximately ten (10) minutes to complete. For your time, you will be entered for a chance to win one (1) of ten (10) $100 Amazon Gift Cards.* Thank you for your participation.
TAKE SURVEY NOW <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/VMT-Vz-state-of-multi-cloud-2]]>
* NO PURCHASE NECESSARY Void where prohibited. Sweepstakes open to eligible participants 18 years or older. Sweepstakes sponsored solely by VMTurbo. For official rules by which all entrants are bound click here <[[http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-survey-terms-and-conditions]]>.
